+        addTypeNameToCode("timestamp", TIMESTAMP_WITH_TIMEZONE);

+        addTypeNameToCode("time", TIME_WITH_TIMEZONE);

         addTypeNameToCode("other", Types.OTHER);

+            return (TypeElement) t.asElement();

             } else {

+                return (TypeElement) t.asElement();
             }
         }
     }
